translations: 公然的，厚颜无耻的；不戴面具的；素颜的

sentences.sentence: Barefaced? No no, this really is my hairy face -look!
sentences.translation: 没有胡子的脸？不不，我的脸实际上是毛茸茸的。看！

sentences.sentence: So Rob is a 'barefaced liar' because he's obviously telling a lie without any embarrassment.
sentences.translation: 因此罗布是一个“厚颜无耻的说谎者”，因为他显然是在不知羞耻地说谎。
